mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_id, ci.cart_id, ci.product_id, ci.quantity, p.name AS productName, p.price AS productPrice FROM CART_ITEM ci JOIN PRODUCT p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART_ITEM (cart_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
